contentfulPost.title: Special Announcement: Sign Up With Ring Savvy Now And Get 200 Minutes Free

description.description: Special Announcement: Sign Up With Ring Savvy Now And Get 200 Minutes Free - Our Way of Helping During COVID-19. Call Us or Sign Up To Get Started.

body.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"No one knows what comes next in the COVID-19 crisis, or when we will find ourselves back in a normal working environment. But, what we do know is that we can’t afford to stop helping people now. People still need emergency services from HVAC companies and plumbers. People still need accountants to help them get their tax returns. In the coming months, people will need cleaning services to help ensure their places of work are safe to operate in.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Everyone has a role to play in getting us through the current pandemic, and that includes Ring Savvy. We know businesses need to stay connected with their customers, and that social distancing guidelines force most of that communication to happen virtually. That’s why we’ve put together a special offer for all businesses, that we believe everyone will benefit from.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Any business owner that signs up with Ring Savvy now will receive 200 free minutes of our live phone answering coverage.","marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" You read that right. Any company that decides to move forward with Ring Savvy after completing our free trial, will get their first 200 minutes absolutely free. You can use these minutes at your own pace, as they will remain 100% free no matter how long it takes you to reach the 200 minute mark. And no, you won’t have to pay us back later. We’re completely covering the bill on this one, because we know it’s the right thing to do.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"“We’ve been speaking with people across all different industries this past month, and just about everyone is struggling right now,” said Ring Savvy CEO Brooke Shatles. “Growing businesses cannot afford to be missing calls during this time, so we’re hoping that as many people as possible will take advantage of the free receptionist help that we’re offering. Even if you aren’t sure if you want to use our company long term, you should sign up now and use this free phone answering coverage to stay connected with customers.”","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"To get your 200 free minutes of live phone answering, all you need to do is ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"fill out our free trial form","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{"uri":"https://www.ringsavvy.com/sign-up/"}},{"nodeType":"text","value":" or call us at (631) 600-1100.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"heading-2","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"How COVID-19 has impacted our operations","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"We’re happy to share that our virtual receptionist team has remained up and running throughout this entire crisis, and our service has continued to operate without any interruptions or limitations. Since mid-March, Ring Savvy’s receptionists have been working out of their homes. Our technology has allowed them to seamlessly continue answering calls, and do so while following the stay-at-home orders put forth in our home state of New York.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Our main call center remains closed, but our business continues to operate on a 24/7 basis. No matter what time a caller reaches out to your company, a member of our team will always be there to pick up the phone. Essentially nothing has changed on our end, besides our location. We’re still able to serve businesses across all industries, we still offer a wide variety of ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"advanced phone answering features","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{"uri":"https://www.ringsavvy.com/services/"}},{"nodeType":"text","value":", and we’re still able to tailor our services to your business’ unique phone answering needs.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"heading-2","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Final Thoughts","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"We would be remiss to end this announcement without saying thank you to all the frontline workers and everyone else who has helped keep this country going over the past month. For the past month, our company’s owners have been making food donations to the doctors and nurses of our local hospital’s ER room, and we hope all of those in a position to help will consider giving back as well.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"paragraph","content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"While we may be physically distant from each other, we still have the ability to band together and make the world a better place during the pandemic. We hope to hear from you all soon, so we can get you started with your 200 free minutes.","marks":[],"data":{}}],"data":{}}]}
